reviewText: Awesome DVD set.  This set should be in the library of every motocross fan.

Watching these races is great because one can see the evolution of supercross in terms of track design, the machinery, as well as how the riders respond to the media. I watch 1 to 3 races while I ride my Schwinn AirDye. Gets me psyched for racing/riding this spring.
The amount of watch time is huge. Picture is better quality than the first time I watch the event on tv back in 86.

Nice to have.. If one wants to enjoy the old races.. However the choices of races is a bit of a let down.. 3-4 races were a must have.. Such as Anaheim 86, LA 86 & 87.. but that's it.. Some races posted on YouTube would have been a better pick in this DVD.. And yeah.. Do not expect much interviews of riders of that era..  Too much time was given to the heat races..

Arrived prior to expected delivery date in excellent condition. When opened, little brother practically fell off his chair. As a former dirt bike racer, he was surprised to find that his former race companions were on tape! Thank-you!
I bought this for my nephew who races, he and my brother love it. We have all seen Bob Hannah who is on the set race several times.

good action some of the early viedos have lost some of the origional color(hondas look kinda purple, should be red) this would be more interesting to someone that was around when these people were at the top of their game,im sure some younger people wouldnt know who joel robert or torsten halman were..a lot of film for the money..
